DOC.brief_summary: Assess prophylactic efficacy topical non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drop prevent macular edema . Patient undergo uncomplicated cataract surgery enrol randomize nepafenac , ketorolac , placebo . Follow-up occur 1 month ocular coherence tomography ( OCT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Nepafenac Ketorolac Versus Placebo Patients Undergoing Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Ability give inform consent Age 18 year old Any preexist retinal disease ( e.g. , diabetic retinopathy , vein occlusion , exudative macular degeneration , etc . ) Previous uveitis Previous intraocular surgery Allergy hypersensitivity NSAIDs Complicated cataract surgery
